description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Dhaka, Bangladesh. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Modern Bangladesh Stay with Rooftop Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Welcome to Crowne Plaza Dhaka Gulshan, an IHG Hotel, a sophisticated escape in the heart of Bangladesh's capital city, Dhaka. Offering a comfortable stay for both business and pleasure, the hotel features a modern design with spacious rooms. Start your day with fresh coffee and pastries at Deli cafe, before enjoying a dip at the rooftop infinity pool. Later, enjoy a mocktail at The Oasis Lounge or indulge in delicious dining at one of the hotel's onsite restaurants.

hotels.title: Five-Star Bangladesh Stay in the Heart of Dhaka's Prestigious Business District
hotels.description: Masterfully placed in the centre of Bangladesh's capital, Intercontinental Dhaka, an IHG Hotel, offers sophisticated five-star luxury and world-renowned hospitality. This urban hideaway boasts a magnificent blend of locally inspired elements with modern amenities. Make yourself at home as you lounge by the pool overlooking Ramna Park, feast your way across five excellent restaurants and bars, keep active at the well-equipped gym or venture beyond the hotel to explore this historic city.
